mapper.insert: insert into song (name, singer_id, album, lyrics, file_path, cover, create_time, duration) values (#{name}, #{singer_id}, #{album}, #{lyrics}, #{file_path}, #{cover}, NOW(), #{duration})
mapper.update: update song set name = #{name}, singer_id = #{singer_id}, album = #{album}, lyrics = #{lyrics}, file_path = #{file_path}, cover = #{cover}, duration = #{duration} where id = #{id}
update song set play_count = play_count + 1 where id = #{id}
